main event: An observer watched a round ball of fire about the size of a small balloon cross the sky and disappear over the western horizon.
interesting points: The object blinked 4 or 5 times before disappearing from view., The sighting was from 1:26 degrees at 7 knots., The conclusion is that the observation is consistent with the sight of a hot air balloon., The observer described the night as clear., The object was seen for a total of 4 minutes.
witness description: a student aged 19 from Oregon State University
